name: ASCII Assault
description:
(v1.1)
Small, two-player turn based strategy game. C++ side project written over the course of a several weeks.

Includes :
-5 maps
-4 Units
-Screen shake
-Explosions
-Barely-buggy UI

Planned features :

-Enemy AI
-Healing units
-Multiple attacks
-Line of sight mechanics

Version 1.1 solved the following issues :

-Screen not always sizing correctly
-Text panel on the right occasionally not clearing properly.
-Inconsistent formatting in the text panel.
-Instructions not displaying correctly in game

More patches incoming.
Download has been pulled from itch.io. (7/3/16)
